channel.title: SQLite's "sqlean": C code for SQLite Extension Stuff
channel.description:
SQLite is a pretty carefully put together piece of C code. Seems they've factored out some bits of interesting functions in C to a common library:
https://github.com/nalgeon/sqlean
So there's random stuff like [transliteration](https://github.com/nalgeon/sqlean/blob/main/src/fuzzy/translit.c), for example or fuzzy string matching. It could be a place to look if that kind of need comes up...

item.title: SQLite's "sqlean": C code for SQLite Extension Stuff
item.dc:creator: hostilefork
item.description:
SQLite is a pretty carefully put together piece of C code. Seems they've factored out some bits of interesting functions in C to a common library:

github.com

GitHub - nalgeon/sqlean: The ultimate set of SQLite extensions

The ultimate set of SQLite extensions

So there's random stuff like transliteration, for example or fuzzy string matching. It could be a place to look if that kind of need comes up...

Read full topic
